content.text: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces" )

content.text: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@40:47 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken"@48:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "lemonade"@57:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "olive oil"@67:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "lime juice"@78:88 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "Worcestershire sauce"@94:114 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@27:38 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, and bay leaf.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic powder"@15:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "onion powder"@30:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "bay leaf"@48:56 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Simmer until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear"@10:63 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "15 to 20 minutes"@65:81 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft.
4) When chicken is fully cooked, transfer to serving bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "transfer"@33:41 / AC
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "serving bowl"@45:57 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:when ( cond-4-0 "When chicken is fully cooked"@3:31 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "lettuce"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "tomatoes"@18:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "cheese"@28:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "salsa"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "sour cream"@47:57 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "serving dishes"@61:75 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Each person can create their own wrap, using their preferred ingredients.
